LanguageData.Bullet_EMTurretSkull.label: fearful aura
LanguageData.EMTurretSkull.label: fearful effigy
LanguageData.EMTurretSkull.description: An aura surrounds this effigy and strikes targets with fears and panic to drive them away. A menacing image stands on the top and watches those who pass by.
LanguageData.EMTurretSkullX.label: fear totem
LanguageData.EMTurretSkullX.description: An intense aura surrounds this totem, those who approach are struck by panic and are driven away. A terrible visage sits atop the totem and watches those who pass by.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretSkull.label: terrifying skull
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretSkull.description: The skull of a humanoid used as a fearsome trophy.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretSkull.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: terrifying skull
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretSkullX.label: horrifying skull
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretSkullX.description: The skull of a humanoid used as a fearsome trophy.
